1.3.0.name: drupal/recurly_hosted

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.3.0.description: Displays options for managing subscription accounts remotely using Recurly's "hosted pages". This module is only necessary if not using more extensive Recurly integration modules such as Commerce Recurly or Recurly.js.
